content_profile.title: Build Once, Profit Forever (The ACP Framework)

key_takeaways: Solution: Start one level broader than your niche, then specialize (Difficulty: beginner)
Growth Tactic: Giving away 'sauce' - not holding anything back in content (Channel: content)
Growth Tactic: Raw, unpolished podcast format (Channel: content)
Strategy: ACP Framework - Audience, Community, Product approach
Strategy: Build once, profit forever model

startup_ideas.title: Vibe coders building free versions of popular Legacy SaaS companies
